title: Tarot Deck
description: Reimagining the tarot cards through different lenses, creating a unique interpretation that honors tradition while bringing fresh perspective to the archetypal imagery.
pitch: A fresh interpretation of the tarot that honors traditional symbolism while bringing contemporary perspective to the timeless archetypes.
challenge: Balancing respect for traditional tarot symbolism with personal artistic vision, ensuring each card maintains its archetypal power while offering new insights.
development: Extensive research into tarot history, symbolism, and various artistic traditions. Deep study of each card's meaning and visual evolution across different decks.
outcome: A unique tarot deck that bridges tradition and innovation, offering both seasoned readers and newcomers fresh perspectives on the archetypal journey.
